lenders.name: rayanne
lenders.loan_because: These people need the money so much more than I do.  They work so hard to provide for their families and deserve a break, no matter how small.  Many have several children and have to pay for their children's education.  I applaud them.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the library of a high school in the U.S.  These students receive a free education, yet so many of them do not appreciate it.  Students in many other countries have to pay for their education, and they appreciate it so much.  We are a selfish nation, unfortunately, and I feel fortunate to help someone in another country who appreciates every single thing they receive.  I wish the young people in the U.S. could see out of your eyes.  Thank you!

lenders.name: luis
lenders.loan_because: i want this because i wuold like to have my oun house i solicitate to you 1000 dolars 500 for buld the house and the other 500 for construccion material
lenders.occupational_info: my work is taking care two persons cook and clean the house

lenders.name: Carole & Shane
lenders.loan_because: Watched Bill Clinton on Oprah and felt the need to help. If we a do a little we can make a big difference in someones life.
lenders.occupational_info: Carole is a Administrative Manager for a Non-Proft. Shane is a full time student at Pepperdine University and a member on the Pepperdine Golf Team.

lenders.name: Life Assistance
lenders.loan_because: God Says to Help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I also own my own business buying and selling real estate (land).  I  started the non-profit to give my blessings away to the youth,  women and men that are homeless, abused or otherwise struggling with this life.

lenders.name: Elli
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.occupational_info: I help deliver babies in the hospital.  I take care of the new moms and babies.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I want to change the world - the same reason I became a teacher.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children K - 5th grades who have learning problems.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people working to make their lives better.  It's a way I can say thanks to the people in my life who have helped me.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: There was a time when I was so poor that I could not have survived without the compassion, kindness and support of others who helped me through that rough patch of my life. Now it's my turn to "pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: Illness forced me to retire several years ago. Now I'm enjoying life with my husband and grandchildren. My passion is rippling light into the world in whatever little ways possible.

lenders.name: Harmony
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people. I don't think I should live extravagant when other people are struggling.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and I am in the military.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I am excited to see people given the opportunity to succeed!  Given the repayment rate, I know that you have been selected both because you have a personal commitment to succeed and because you have a good plan.   Good luck!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in many fields including education, real estate, electronic repair, restaurants (cooking and serving), computer programming and am currently doing retail sales (as is my wife Sue).

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I believe small acts of kindness can create a world of difference for others; which in turn, will help create a better world for everyone. It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an educator, who works with children.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: It's a small way to help others do great things!

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: My mother taught me and leads by example, that it is the right thing to do. When you have what you need, give so that others can have what they need.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Teller at a Bank in Canada.

lenders.name: Cornelius Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference - this is one way.

lenders.name: MARTHA
lenders.loan_because: I feel that the people featured here on Kiva are really trying to better themselves and I'm happy to play a small role in their success.  It makes me feel really good to be helping someone out.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: micro-lending is a way to help people in distant towns and villages, hopefully help them change their lives for the better
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an international humanitarian aid organization and work with First Nations in Canada

lenders.name: Meg and Dean
lenders.occupation: Church Pastor and Media Relations Director
lenders.loan_because: We loan to share our blessings and to spread the goodness of God.
lenders.occupational_info: Meg is a church minister in the United Church of Christ. Dean works for an athletics department of a university.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: Its another way I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I explore for Uranium in Canada.

lenders.name: Cheristy
lenders.loan_because: Because one person can make a difference

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It certainly makes a difference and helps others to improve their lives.  I feel honored to be able to give as much as possible...
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a single father to two adopted boys from other countries...they are my world!

lenders.name: Don and Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I feel that the small business person is the foundation of any society. They were the backbone of the American dream.
lenders.occupational_info:
Along with being a former volunteer Commissioner of Public Housing for San Diego County I
work as the president of a tenants association in a senior apartment building. Retired people should give back as much as they can to their community.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.occupation: Service Coordinator for a social services agency
lenders.loan_because: I believe in world citizenship and global connectivity, that changing the world should start in your own backyard and extend to the other side of the globe.  I know that, living in the US, I take for granted a lot of opportunities that are not available to people in other countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have developmental and physical disabilities.  I support them in developing important life skills and accessing the services and supports then need to lead a successful and independent life.

lenders.name: albert
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good, I am a father who is trying to show my young and beautiful daughter that we have the abilitly to help others and we should always look to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the great company of toyota, building cars and sending out parts to dealerships.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to know that I'm really helping someone fulfill their dream, goal or something important to them because they do not have the bevy of resources that we have in developed countries.  Many of us do not take advantage of all that we can, yet I am proud of someone in a poor country taking the chance to rise above their circumstances to make life better for themselves and others.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for the elderly and infirm.

lenders.name: Nana
lenders.loan_because:
"We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give."
Winston Churchill
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of children and adults.

lenders.name: Carly
lenders.loan_because: I like making a difference and I love the personal stories!

lenders.name: Rose & John
lenders.loan_because: We are inspired by the initiative of these entrepreneurs and want to support them in whatever small way we can.
lenders.occupational_info: John is a retired businessman.  Rose was a family therapist.  Currently we enjoy our family and traveling.

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: We all need a helping hand every now and then...
lenders.occupational_info: Fun, challenging and rewarding...

lenders.name: cristina
lenders.loan_because: I have never had an issue with giving a so called "handout" ,but Kiva turns that into a hand up. I have needed that in my life and been  fortunate enough to have family who helped me, so this is the least that I can do. Pay it forward baby, pay it forward!
lenders.occupational_info: I cut, color & style hair, pretty much a universal trade.

lenders.name: Rhonda
lenders.loan_because: I am excited to see people empowered by just a bit of help from the outside... but I know to get a loan they have had to work hard to get where they are now!!  I am glad to help hardworking friends!  They are an inspiration to others!
lenders.occupational_info: I live in the Philippines helping friends with livelihood projects and small businesses

lenders.name: Glen
lenders.loan_because: it is an effective way to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people start and grow their businesses.

lenders.name: Heidi Kai
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student, trying to find my way in the world.

lenders.name: Joannie
lenders.loan_because: This organization is a great opportunity and I'm hoping to be able to help improve someone's life even just a little.  It makes me happy to be a part of Kiva. I also sponsor through World Vision.
lenders.occupational_info: Stay at home mom and owner of Joanniel Creations, my unique handmade jewellery line.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: We hope to help these people because we always have food on the table and a lot of people don't.
lenders.occupational_info: We work in a local hospital and for the local doctors.

lenders.name: JOSEPH
lenders.loan_because: I DO WHAT I HAVE TO DO NOW, SO I CAN DO WHAT I WANT TO DO LATER.
lenders.occupational_info: Retail sales.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I saw the Opra Winfrey show which inspired me to try to make a difference  for people trying to  improve their lives.

lenders.name: Celia
lenders.loan_because: I want to see women especially reach their goals,dreams and become financially independent.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a yarn shop in a small rural town where women mostly come everyday andknit or crochet and talk about their lives good and bad. I sell relaxation and creativity!

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: I can help other people.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe being involved in international giving is the way to Peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Customer Service representaive for a major utility.  I help people to make arrangements to pay their bills and take care of other concerns they may have.

lenders.name: The Haider Family
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed and would hope to make a difference to those in need.

lenders.name: LeAnn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in small steps for big change
lenders.occupational_info: I work in online retail as Web Producer.

lenders.name: Passing it on
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed and want to be a blessing to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with their money

lenders.name: aarti
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance

lenders.name: Betty
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.  I want to help business owners keep their dreams alive.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hotel and make reservations.

lenders.name: Nga
lenders.loan_because: I want to help families who want to help themselves. Being Vietnamese, my family struggled to make it. I know all we ever wanted was a bit of help, not a hand out.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: It is fun to help those who are trying to help themselves!  It takes so little to assist someone to change their lives!!

lenders.name: Mike & Debbie
lenders.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: Oil And Natural Gas Production in Canada.

lenders.name: www.omg-thatsit.com
lenders.loan_because: One day we all need some help to stand up and continue walking on our path... And I hope we can make a difference on this man made crazy planet.
lenders.occupational_info:
Image tells more than 1000 words. Please check my website... Please FireFox browser. MAC & PC.
Thank you ;-)

Soleil's Photography
www.omg-thatsit.com

lenders.name: Madhavi
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed throughout my life.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed and am able to help.  Everyone needs some help sometime.  I have witnessed what a helping hand can do in my life.  It makes a world of difference when someone has faith in you.   I want to help someone else fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a university.  My job is to plan the university president's social, athletic and cultural events.  I guess you can say I plan parties!

lenders.name: The Schneiders
lenders.loan_because: we believe in Kiva and believe in helping people who take the initiative to help themselves

lenders.name: Dale
lenders.loan_because: I enoying giving and look forward to watching hard working individuals get a head with a little help. It is kind of like give them a fish or show them how to fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with start up compaines with their marketing and product developement and also teach part time.

lenders.name: Sunny
lenders.loan_because: It is imperative to provide opportunities
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the area of international environmental policy, focusing upon Canada's positions and obligations under the UNEP Stockholm Convention and the UNECE Convention on Long-range Transboundary Air Pollution

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky enough to travel to many places in the world where poverty is  a way of live.  It helps to know how to help if only a bit.

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: As I have traveled around the world I have come to realize how fortunate I am.  I hope my small loans can help others.

lenders.name: Ann W
lenders.loan_because: When I loan, I feel I make a difference in someone's future as well as my own.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of keeping the yard and property of the apartment complex where I live.  I keep public areas clean and safe, replace lights, care for trees and shrubs, pick up trash and respond to the concerns of tenants.

lenders.name: Deborah and Kelsey
lenders.loan_because: We have so much ourselves and it is amazing to see just how little it really takes from each person to hopefully make a real difference in someone else's life. Kiva helps to make this possible.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for what the universe has provided me and I want to make a difference in the world, no matter how big or small.
lenders.occupational_info: One of my life objectives is to show people that we can all make a difference. Giving Kiva gift certificates to my friends provides them the opportunity to see and decide how they can make a difference in other peoples' lives. Hopefully, they will pay it forward.

lenders.name: Joseph Battaglia
lenders.loan_because: Everyone in the world deserves the opportunity to support their families! This is a small way I can help a fellow entrepreneur to succeed !
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a husband and a father of 2 children a daughter and a son.
Here in Canada I arrange financing for the purchase of real estate.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I love helping women across the Globe become even better entrepreneurs!
lenders.occupational_info: I own 2 successful Internet Business' in the Real Estate Industry and the Self Help Industry.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who take the initiative to help themselves. I admire hardworking people and I like the Kiva organization because I am able to see where my money is going and after it is repaid, I can help another person.  Brilliant!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a kindergarten teacher in Carson, CA.
I am also an Independent Beauty Consultant with Mary Kay Cosmetics.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO DO WHAT I CAN TO HELP.
lenders.occupational_info: I AM A VENDOR OF NATIVE JEWELERY,I SELL AT NATIVE AMERICAN GATHERINGS,POW WOWS ,ETC.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: i am thankful for every blessing and chance i have been given and believe in giving that to others as i know the peace and hope it brought me.
lenders.occupational_info: i work in a children's hospital with children who have been burned.  i support them emotionally by explaining what happens in their care and being supportive when family can't be with them. i do whatever possible to make a scary place and medical experience more kid friendly and less stressful.

lenders.name: Geoff
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in people's lives and reduce the huge gap in living standards worldwide.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for trucking companies to help them move their freight.

lenders.name: Jerry and Jacob
lenders.loan_because: For the price of 5 coffees I can help somebody to better their life? It's a "No brainer" !!!

lenders.name: adrienne
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy the feeling of giving. The life changing effects of this site is beauty for all that give to make a change for another person.

lenders.name: Melodie
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist people around the world to have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a homemaker who enjoys painting, cooking, baking and my grandchildren.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Just want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I suppy construction materials to the building industry

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I feel that everyone has the opportunity to make a difference in the world no matter how small, monetary or otherwise.  My family has raised me to share with others and help others.  As a small business owner, my father often made loans to employees and while he didn't always get the full amount back, he taught me about the importance of helping others so that they can first help themselves, then help others, as well.  It is with the idea of paying it forward that I continue to help others through Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher who works with young students on a daily basis- preparing them for their own great future.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to help someone.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: it helps make the world a better place for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach five and six year old Kindergarten students in a public school setting. It is a joy to come to work every day!

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I've had a lot of help the last few years from some great people who have helped me recover from the "big wind" destruction of four hurricanes.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the United States Government gathering information about the US economy.  I go to small, medium and large businesses in order to get this information.  I hear about their business struggles, plans, successes and failures in the course of my work.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: Someone loaned to me almost 10 years ago to start my business and I wanted to do that for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Sales Director in the field of cosmetics.  I sell cosmetics directly to customers and I also share the same opportunity with other women and help them to build their own cosmetics  business.

lenders.name: marcel
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my rich life and help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a school for business administration.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people advance in life.  Everyone should have the chance.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's important for everyone to help others when they can. The amount doesn't matter, what matters is everyone reaching out to the extent that they are able.
lenders.occupational_info: I managed retail stores for 20 years, currently I sell computer systems to retail stores.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because:
"Only through the act of giving can our feelings of powerlessness and separateness recede.  For it is through this act of giving that we are awakened to the interconnectedness that binds us all and then we realize that giving to others is also giving to ourselves.  And soon we too shall want for nothing."  –Eric A. DeCuir Jr.  2008

Quote I try to live by:
“A human being is part of the whole called by us universe , a part limited in time and space. We experience ourselves, our thoughts and feelings as something separate from the rest. A kind of optical delusion of consciousness. This delusion is a kind of prison for us, restricting us to our personal desires and to affection for a few persons nearest to us. Our task must be to free ourselves from the prison by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature in its beauty... We shall require a substantially new manner of thinking if mankind is to survive." -Albert Einstein
lenders.occupational_info: Research on the optical and electronic properties of semiconductors materials ;)

lenders.name: Hubert
lenders.loan_because: I would like to change your life and also want you to be in a position to change the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Lead Program Manager that manages a team consisting of Project Managers and Analysts.

lenders.name: Steve & Laura
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help developing countries and entrepreneurs around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very high paced with a lot of hours. Restaurant businesses are known for having the worst hours. I manage a team of employees from kitchen staff to front staff.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I feel lucky to work in a profession that I enjoy.  I became a math teacher many years ago and it is a pleasure to do what you want in your adult life.  I want others to understand that same sense of joy.
lenders.occupational_info: After being a teacher for 13 years I became a school administrator.  I have only worked at the high school level (14 - 18 year olds).  In some countries I would called the Head Master or Director.

lenders.name: Sofia
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected, we are all human, and we all want the same things: security, better life for our children, love, happiness, to live with dignity.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: it matters.

lenders.name: Dydric
lenders.loan_because: I want to give hope to people and help those who are aspiring for a better future.
lenders.occupational_info: making a difference through small everyday things

lenders.name: brandon
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back what the Almighty Lord has blessed my family with..
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves computer communications around the world

lenders.name: kyla and Jimmy
lenders.loan_because: Matthew 25:40 " Whenever you did one of these things to someone overlooked or ignored, that was me—you did it to me."

lenders.name: cathy
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to lend a hand to someone who can use one.

lenders.name: maureen
lenders.loan_because: this is a great idea and I'm happy to be a part of it.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own a family farm, with the help of 1 son on the farm and 4 other children off the farm, but involved and owning animals. We milk 200 head of Brown Swiss, Holsteins, and Jerseys.

lenders.name: monica
lenders.loan_because: its fun.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because: Helping others in any way, no matter how incremental, to become more self-sufficient is a way to change the world.

lenders.name: FRANCINE
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to struggle and never having friends to loan you money or to assist you.  Sometimes you get lucky or you just pray with conviction to the Lord and then he certainly makes a way for whatever you need. I wish to support others who are unfortunate to have the life style they seek .  We are all GOD's children and it is important to assist others as "his" instrument for the better in all.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business woman who has  the passion to assist others.  I believe that is what my calling is and I want to do this as a gift to those who have had their struggles as I have.

lenders.name: Erick
lenders.occupational_info: PC Technical support

lenders.name: Don and Jim
lenders.loan_because: We have met many Mexican people since moving here.  They are lovely, honest and hard working people whom we will support in any way.
lenders.occupational_info: A retired broadcaster turned retailer now living in Mexico and a retired telecommunications rep.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I know that even my small donations make a big difference in the lives of others and I trust Kiva completly.  It is a great organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy things and re-sell them on Ebay and also make jewelry that I try to sell at fairs and stores.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because:
I love micro-lending! And I love Kiva! 

Recommended Reading:

Banker To The Poor: Micro-Lending and the Battle Against World Poverty
by Muhammad Yunus, Founder of the Grameen Bank, Winner of the Nobel Peace Prize

Creating a World Without Poverty: Social Business and the Future of Capitalism
by Muhammad Yunus

Give Us Credit by Alex Counts (1996)
Muhammad Yunus mentions this book in Banker to the Poor on page 188.
He says that it is the most fascinating storytelling he has ever read.

My Favorite Kiva Video - The LAPO Women of Nigeria:
LAPO Women Say Their Thank You's - http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=20 or see it at YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gn3G2wc9bUc.

lenders.name: Sindee
lenders.loan_because: I want to give something back especially to help women working hard to make a better life for their children.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired teacher and principal now volunteer teaching and helping older women.

lenders.name: Kristie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: Helping people feels good and I'm grateful to be able to help in this way.  I grew up in small businesses and I have my own small businesses.  If I can assist someone in establishing or improving theirs, I'm all for it!
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites and provide IT services to small business and residential clients.  I also produce e-learning modules for delivery over the web and am a world traveler.  I love my life!

lenders.name: Kaytlyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to support small businesses in my personal and professional work.
lenders.occupational_info: I support small businesses in my own community, working one-on-one to help people start up their own websites and create business materials. I understand the passion, confidence and perserverance of small business owners.

lenders.name: Michele Allen
lenders.loan_because: owning my own business added to my happiness and security enormously. I want to help other people improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I setup computers and teach small-business owners how to use them.

lenders.name: greg
lenders.loan_because: We all need a little now and then, for very little dollars I can help make a big difference in someone life. Especially in the life of a entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: Help families save for retirement

lenders.name: Clifford
lenders.loan_because:
'Credit is a Human Right'
           Muhammad Yunus
lenders.occupational_info: Producer of grains -- canola, wheat, barley, oats

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: What seems like a small amount to me can make a difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: SUSAN
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who have very little and are working hard to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Very satisfying & helps me understand how essential it is to have the funds when a business needs to be started.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others and to make a positive difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I started my own pet sitting service where I care for other people's pets while they're working or on vacation.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: people deserve a chance in providing a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Ronald
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who are willing to help themselves.  Kiva makes regifting a good thing...
lenders.occupational_info: I provide technical support to cable television operators.  I work for a cable equipment distributor that supplies everything from nuts and bolts to digital headend solutions.  I am a member of Christians in Communications, and a member of Community of Christ Church.  Come join me in makeing a difference.     Let me send you an Invite.  Email me at ramos@adamsglobal.com

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: God has given me the gift of giving. "I am because we are; because we are, therefore I am."
lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand and respect each other in the workplace.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I do accounting for one of the large movie studios.

lenders.name: Anne Obradovich
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of the change I want to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying so that I might also build my own business, perhaps Kiva may help me one day to do so.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I loan funds to those in need, because at one time I was a person in need.  Now that I am able to pay it forward I do so as much as possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with students who are disabled by using visual arts to enable them to explore themselves and the wonderful world around them.

lenders.name: Isabel
lenders.loan_because: there but for the grace of God go I

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I was in poverty rasing 2 children alone and someone extended their hand to help me. I am just passing it forward. Its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on Air Force Jets.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: God gave me a gift when I was born. That gift was to Love Everyone on this Earth no matter what, religion, race, creed, color. I have been giving to strangers, family, friends all my life. I will give until the day God calls me home to rest. I love you.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at two hospital's in Ilinois, doing patient registration, giving them the best service each and every day, with a beautiful smile and a great personality. I love helping people.

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: it's a small flutter of a butterfly wing.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the World.
lenders.occupational_info: Part owner of a Century 21 office.

lenders.name: Shane
lenders.occupational_info: I am contracted out by our department of fisheries or industry to take marine fisheries stock assessment or complete marine habitat environmental assessments.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: Everyone who is willing to work for their dreams deserves support to achieve it as I have done myself. I'm very excited to have this opportunity to assist others in their success for their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for city government and am assigned to lower income neighborhoods where I can help improve the lives of people by improving the neighborhoods that they live in. I work to bring new industrial companies, commerical businesses, and the development of new housing to a community that has not seen new development in many years.  I also assist in the development of new schools and parks for the residents.

lenders.name: CANDI
lenders.loan_because: I admire anyone who takes the initiative to make their life better by working hard and needs some help to accomplish their goal.

lenders.name: Yasmina
lenders.loan_because:
It is just beautiful to see how easy it is to make this world a better place  with little love and little money every bit counts.  

Also, I remember my grandparents telling us similar stories about having to borrow money or trade certain services to survive during World War II.

We are blessed so lets share the wealth.
lenders.occupational_info: Administrator

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I once worked as a volunteer in Kenya: Nairobi, Kisumu and Ugunja

lenders.name: Cassandra
lenders.occupation: Flint River Ranch Pet Food Distributor
lenders.loan_because:
I know that Father God wants us all to help each other!
What a Blessing this is for everyone involved!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell Safe Dog & Cat food. We have had many recalls on pet food here in America.  And many pets have died due to unsafe food.

lenders.name: Charity
lenders.loan_because: I want this world to be a better place, and I think this is one way to help that happen.  I believe that, as a civilization, we now have the resources and technology to bring everyone on earth out of extreme poverty.  Not to do so would be  unethical and short-sighted in terms of global safety.  This is why I support the United Nations Millenium Development Goals, and why I loan on Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on projects to prevent, cleanup or contain pollution to help protect people and the environment.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to have people believe in me when I needed it.  I have also seen first hand what a difference such loans can make to people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Assisting small scale dairy farmers transition into value added production and bring their products into the marketplace.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I love empowering people to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: service & hospitality industry

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I love to help others fulfill their dreams while providing an income for themselves and their families. And it just plain feels good! :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I turned a passion into a business - selling collector grade crystal and mineral specimens. Yes, I sell rocks! :-)

lenders.name: Puy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Marion Eichler
lenders.loan_because: It seems to be a great way to help hardworking people, who do not have access to the same financial resources as we do. Hopefully this small effort on my part will make a difference in their lives !!!

lenders.name: Shawn & Lance
lenders.loan_because: We feel lucky and fortunate to be able to loan and to be in the company of such giving souls. Thank You Kiva and to everyone who makes this happen.

lenders.name: Michael Kocher
lenders.loan_because: Right now circumstances and choices leave me unable to travel internationally and help people directly. In fact, because of my line of work, my interaction is most likely to be decidedly unpeaceful. I want to try and do what I can to help, above and beyond what else is possible from home.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a United States Marine and serve my country as much as I can. I'm also a University student pursuing a degree in Politics, with an intention to someday go into political consulting, policy analysis and international governmental consulting, hopefully building enough influence to stop the sorts of conflicts I currently work in.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I believe God wants His people to love and care for one another.   It's exciting to imagine how these businesses will flourish.

lenders.name: Alain Wong
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a reason not to.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Technical Support Engineer in the Silicon Valley (California). My job is to help customers resolve technical issues with their internet equipment.

lenders.name: Adri
lenders.loan_because: I love to see others plant/grow and flourish their dreams.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others; especially single women supporting children.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a real estate broker.  I help people buy and sell homes.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: Some one has helped me in my endevors.
lenders.occupational_info: Performing Arts Stuido                               Also Globalinx .net
